original_text: And when ye will offer a sacrifice of thanksgiving unto the Lord, offer it at your own will.
korean_text: 너희가 여호와께 감사제물을 드리려거든 너희가 기쁘게 받으심이 되도록 드릴지며

sentences.original_text: And when ye will offer a sacrifice of thanksgiving
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 감사의 제물을 드릴 때에

sentences.original_text: offer it at your own will
